StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPreCommissionData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaId int AS
SELECT p.[PRECOMMISSION_ID] ,p.[NWA_ID] ,p.[CONTRACT_ID] ,p.[TBS_ID] ,p.[FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] ,p.[PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] ,p.[FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] ,p.[PRIVATE_PILOT] ,p.[FLIGHT_HOURS] ,p.[CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] ,p.[REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] ,p.[USER_LOGIN] ,p.[UPDATE_DATE] ,c.[COMMISSION_DATE] ,t.[CLASS] AS TBS_CLASS ,t.[FY] AS TBS_FY ,a.[ACCESSION_DATE] ,rfa.[MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[PRECOMMISSION_DATA] p WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[COMMISSIONEE] c on p.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] LEFT JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[TBS] t on p.TBS_ID = t.TBS_ID LEFT JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_ACCESSION] a on p.[NWA_ID] = a.[NWA_ID] LEFT JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[RFA_TRACKING_DATES] rfa on p.[CONTRACT_ID] = rfa.[CONTRACT_ID] WHERE p.[NWA_ID] = @NwaId
